official_title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of October 10 through 16, 1976, as "Native American Awareness Week."

summary.text: Authorizes and directs the President to issue a proclamation designating the week of October 10 through 16, 1976, as "Native American Awareness Week."

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the President to proclaim the week of October 10 through 16, 1976, as "Native American Awareness Week."
